short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that hides points, number of comments, and user karma on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: humble-hn is a Chrome extension that hides the number of votes and comments of stories, and the karma of users on Hacker News. The objective of this extensions is to remove the influence of these numbers on the perception of the content.
